short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stand your ground with Vash the Stampede as he aims true, clad in his iconic orange coat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Vash the Stampede with a dynamic theme showcasing his iconic style and energy!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Vash aiming his gun with precision, dressed in his signature orange coat, set against a bold and fiery backdrop.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a display inspired by the rugged and relentless world of Trigun.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate easily to your favorite websites with Vash’s trademark efficiency.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into gun-slinging mini-games inspired by the thrilling universe of Trigun.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and effective searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as sharp and impactful as Vash himself.
